price: 76. Nous n’avons point été envers eux injustes mais ils étaient eux les injustes.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
